content: indulge in the cozy luxury of the soft granite blanket with a range of sizes from baby to cal king this versatile pattern offers a seamless and reversible design worked flat in a captivating stripes/colorwork pattern the written instructions are complemented by a video stitch tutorial for added guidance **unique features-** reversible and seamless construction for a polished finish written pattern with video stitch tutorial for comprehensive guidance captivating stripes/colorwork pattern for visual interest multiple sizes included **materials needed-** hook 15mm us size 19 0 yarn shown in lion brand hometown https //amzn to/45lmspv super bulky weight 830-5694 yards
